greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Minimum sum of a strict factorization of n into factors > 1.
comment: a(n) >= A001414(n), with equality iff n is squarefree or four times a squarefree number (i.e., A000188(n) <= 2). - _Charlie Neder_, Sep 10 2018
link: Charlie Neder, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Sep 09 2018
